results.firPara: • If we want to fight for trophies we need to keep that intensity
results.secPara: • If we want to fight for trophies we need to keep that intensity
results.webTitle: Mauricio Pochettino demands more from Tottenham after win over Chelsea

results.firPara: The Liverpool central defender Tiago Ilori has been offered a route out of Anfield by the Championship club Reading. The Portugal under-23 international, who has been unable to make an impact at Liverpool since arriving from Sporting Lisbon in 2013, is wanted by Jaap Stam on loan this month with a view to a permanent transfer in the summer.
results.secPara: Liverpool are open to a deal with Ilori not featuring in Jürgen Klopps first-team plans and spending the season with the under-23s.
results.webTitle: Reading want to recruit Liverpool defender Tiago Ilori on loan

results.firPara: Chelseas defeat at White Hart Lane means they have failed to equal Arsenals English top-flight record winning run of 14 consecutive matches, falling one short at 13, although they did match the record for successive wins in a single season.
results.secPara: Chelseas run began following their 3-0 defeat at Arsenal on 24 September, after which they won 2-0 at Hull City and carried on winning right through October, November and December.
results.webTitle: Arsenal’s record lives on – how Arsène Wenger’s boys of 2002 made history

results.firPara: Two lovely headed goals from Dele Alli continued his brilliant run of form and ended Chelseas 13-match winning streak
results.secPara: Two lovely headed goals from Dele Alli continued his brilliant run of form and ended Chelseas 13-match winning streak
results.webTitle: Tottenham Hotspur 2-0 Chelsea: Premier League – as it happened

results.firPara: Farhad Moshiri, Evertons major shareholder, has said he will not allow the club to become a museum as it was confirmed plans to relocate to a new dockside stadium have progressed with Liverpool city council.
results.secPara: Moshiri outlined his ambitions for Everton at the clubs annual general meeting on Wednesday, his first since acquiring a 49.9% stake last February. The British-Iranian billionaire has made an interest-free loan of £80m to the club, used to pay off other loans totalling £54.8m plus a severance payment to the former manager Roberto Martínez, and has visited potential sites for a new stadium in recent months at Bramley Moore dock and Stonebridge Cross on the outskirts of the city.
results.webTitle: Everton reveal at AGM that plan for new ground by docks is on track

results.firPara: Alan Curtis was merely saying what plenty of people had been thinking on Saturday evening as the lights went out at the Liberty Stadium in the wake of yet another defeat and news filtered through that Paul Clement had agreed to become Swansea Citys new manager. He had the security of a top job at Bayern Munich but he wanted the challenge, Curtis, Swanseas first-team coach, said after the win at Crystal Palace on Tuesday night. I told him if I was him I would have stayed in Germany.
results.secPara: Working alongside Carlo Ancelotti at Bayern Munich, enjoying the view from the top of the Bundesliga during the winter break and looking forward to a Champions League tie against Arsenal next month sounds like a reasonable gig and, on the face of it, a lot more appealing than taking over at Swansea, who had just sacked their second manager in the space of 85 days and were anchored to the foot of the Premier League table.
results.webTitle: Paul Clement will bring diligence, pragmatism and patience to Swansea | Stuart James

results.firPara: Sunderland have turned down a £6m bid for Jermain Defoe from West Ham United and have reiterated that they have no intention of selling their leading scorer.
results.secPara: It is the second offer from West Ham that Sunderland have received since the transfer window opened – the opening salvo was £5m – and West Ham officials are understood to have encouraged David Moyes to name his price for the 34‑year‑old former England striker.
results.webTitle: Sunderland reject £6m bid for Jermain Defoe from West Ham United

results.firPara: Marco Silva has managed Sporting Lisbon and Olympiakos but is he fully ready for the troubles on and off the pitch with the Premier Leagues basement club?
results.secPara: Marco Silva has managed Sporting Lisbon and Olympiakos but is he fully ready for the troubles on and off the pitch with the Premier Leagues basement club?
results.webTitle: Looking for a Silva lining: the big problems facing Hull’s new manager

results.firPara: Another former coach from Crewe Alexandra, described as a long-standing club stalwart because of his work with their youth-team players, has been suspended by the Football Association.
results.secPara: Paul McCann worked for Crewe in the 1980s and 90s and at one stage was the assistant coach in charge of the clubs youth team.
results.webTitle: Former Crewe youth coach suspended by Football Association
